results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እንደ ጋራዎች ኾነው በባሕር ውስጥ የተሠሩት ተንሻለዮቹም (ታንኳዎች) የእርሱ ናቸው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በእርሷ (በምድር) ላይ ያለው ሁሉ ጠፊ ነው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: የልቅናና የልግሥና ባለቤት የኾነው የጌታህ ፊትም ይቀራል፡፡ (አይጠፋም)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
